Clean up the data (do not show the code).

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
D4 <- readSheet("Bleeding")
D4 <- D4[!is.na(label)]
D4 <- D4[,
         `:=` (nWarfarin = as.numeric(nWarfarin),
               yWarfarin = as.numeric(yWarfarin))]
D4 <- tidyData(D4)
write.csv(D4, file="mtcBleedingData.csv", row.names=FALSE)
print(xtable(D4, digits=rep(0, 5)), type="html", include.rownames=FALSE)
network <- mtc.network(D4[!is.na(responders)])
```

`Run the model using `r sprintf("%s-effects", effect)`.

```{r network, results='hide'}
M <- mtc.model(network, type="consistency", linearModel=effect)
plot(M)
results <- mtc.run(M, n.adapt=nAdapt, n.iter=nIter, thin=thin)
```

# Summary

Direct and indirect odds ratios and 95% confidence bounds are stored in
[mtcBleedingOddsRatios.csv](mtcBleedingOddsRatios.csv).

```{r, results='asis'}
or <- combineResults(outcomeBleeding=TRUE)
write.csv(or, file="mtcBleedingOddsRatios.csv", row.names=FALSE)
print(xtable(or), type="html", include.rownames=FALSE)
```
